titleStmt.title: The infallibility of the Roman Catholick church and her miracles, defended against Dr. Stillingfleets cavils, unworthily made publick in two late books, the one called An answer to several treatises, &c., the other A vindication of the Protestant grounds of faith, against the pretence of infallibility in the Roman church, &c. / by E.W. ; the first part.
titleStmt.author: E. W. (Edward Worsley), 1605-1676.

titleStmt.title: The infallibility of the Roman Catholick church and her miracles, defended against Dr. Stillingfleets cavils, unworthily made publick in two late books, the one called An answer to several treatises, &c., the other A vindication of the Protestant grounds of faith, against the pretence of infallibility in the Roman church, &c. / by E.W. ; the first part.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"A discourse concerning miracles wrought in the Roman Catholick Church" has separated title page and pagination. Wing number W3613 for this item cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
